longDesc: Streamline your restaurant operations with Ovvi's all-in-one POS system. Collect orders, track inventory, and access the key information you need to make smart business decisions that positively impact your bottom line.

features.description: Fully customizable table layout to make it easy to navigate your floor plan
Check management/split payments by item, table, guest
Has a multi-store capability that allows you to connect all of your locations seamlessly
Cloud-based back office makes viewing and managing reports from anywhere
